Actions.Name: Spiral Horn
Actions.Effects: Create a volatile mote, a terrain effect, next to every character affected. When the Bicorn passes through a mote, it picks it up and increases the hit and miss damage of this ability by +2 permanently. (so picking up one would make it do [D]+2, twice, and 3 damage, twice on a miss, for example).

Actions.Name: Destabilize
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 becomes vulnerable. If that foe moves more than 1 space on its next turn, it also takes [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Gallop
Actions.Description: Dash 2. If this movement is in a straight line, increase to dash 4.
